original_title: UFC Fight Night 134: Shogun vs. Smith
overview: UFC Fight Night 134: Shogun vs. Smith was a mixed martial arts event produced by the Ultimate Fighting Championship held on July 22, 2018, at Barclaycard Arena in Hamburg, Germany. A light heavyweight bout between former UFC Light Heavyweight Champion Maur√≠cio Rua and Anthony Smith headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 134: Shogun vs. Smith
